sentences.sContent: Plastic crates held French books as well as a smattering of English titles, mostly movie and television picture volumes.
sentences.sContent_eng: Plastic crates held French books as well as a smattering of English titles, mostly movie and television picture volumes.
sentences.sCn: 塑料筐里装着法国书籍及少数的英国书，很多都是电影和电视图片册。

sentences.sContent: Despite the green hues in this image, these rocky islands are too cold to sustain more than a smattering of low-growing vegetation.
sentences.sContent_eng: Despite the green hues in this image, these rocky islands are too cold to sustain more than a smattering of low-growing vegetation.
sentences.sCn: 除了图中绿色的部分，这些气候严寒，主要为岩石构造的岛屿上，只有极少数低矮植物可以生存。

synos.tran: 略知；肤浅地学习；粉碎（smatter的ing形式）

words.tran: 略知，浅知；东拉西扯地泛论；略会说

trans.tranOther: a small number or amount of something
